p:
The two model versions differ in the way they fit serological data. In the static version of the model (FOI model) a constant, age-independent force of infection (FOI) Î» is fitted to each serological survey. Alternatively, in the dynamical version of the model ( R
0 model), a basic reproduction number R
0 is fitted, based on the classical SIR model framework under the assumption of endemic equilibrium transmission [ 14].
